    Papers and Training

    Source: vignettes/sassy-training.Rmd
    sassy-training.Rmd

    Some information on the sassy packages exists outside the system documentation. Here are some links to those external sources.

    Papers

    Below is a list of papers covering various aspects of the sassy system:

    • Why SASSY?, 2025
    • Replicating SAS Reports in R: The REPORTER Package, 2024
    • Examining the R datastep() Function, 2024
    • Replicating SAS® Procedures in R with the PROCS Package, 2024
    • An Overview of the SASSY System, 2023

    SASSY Training

    The following training videos can help get you up to speed on the sassy system:

    • Logr Package Overview
    • Introduction to Data Libraries in R
    • Introduction to Reporter
    • Creating a Format Catalog from Data
    • Overview of the proc_reg() Function
    • How to Run a Batch Job in R

    R Training

    If you know nothing about R, these videos can give you the basics:

    • 01.00 Introduction to R
    • 01.01 IDE Setup
    • 01.02 Vectors
    • 01.03 Lists
    • 01.04 Factors
    • 01.05 Data Frames
    • 01.06 Tibbles
    • 01.07 Operators in R
